Name: [Shield] Warm Bracers
Desc: When attacked, if the Agent's HP is below 25%, immediately generate Shield equal to <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> of Max HP for 10s. (This effect can only be triggered once by each Agent in each combat.)
Desc2: It's not practical to hope it will stop damage. But graffiti lovers like wearing it to protect their wrists.
